mapper.sql: id, hnum, name, card, starttime, endtime, days, total, dengjitime
mapper.insert:
insert into houseinfo
id,
hnum,
name,
card,
starttime,
endtime,
days,
total,
dengjitime,
status,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{hnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{starttime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{endtime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{days,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{total,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dengjitime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update houseinfo
hnum = #{hnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card = #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE},
days = #{days,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dengjitime = #{dengjitime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update houseinfo set hnum = #{hnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card = #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, days = #{days,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dengjitime = #{dengjitime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from houseinfo order by dengjitime desc
